title: Cannadex
blurb: Compliance-first marketplace & data protocol for licensed cannabisâ€”inventory, lab results, pricing, and settlement rails.
description: Cannadex provides a registry and exchange layer for licensed cannabis participants. It normalizes COAs, models batches/lots with chain-of-custody, handles inventory visibility and pricing, and exposes a region-aware API. Optional payment modules enable ACH, stablecoins, or Bitcoin/LN where lawful. Built with auditability, minimal data retention, and strong role-based access.
